text:
<@U04HLBUT9QC> hs --version
5.0.1
Does it possible to create a 100% custom screen for a the creation of a custom object with th nw UI extension framework ?
Custom object, like a standard object has a page type of record page, and in that sense it needs to follow a certain set of structure. Can you tell me more about your problem?

• you can add more than one tab, through page editor public beta.
• You can add multiple cards on a tab

Because UI extensions look so much like HubSpot UI, it's not easy for end-users to know what's custom-built by their company (in-house or through an agency). The footer was added to help these users identify what's built by HubSpot and what's custom-built so that they can get help based on that.

<@U042JNC6ZAM> I take your feedback that you would like to customize the label. Our first pass was to get the footer out, we will think of footer customization next. Keep all good feedback coming.

Hello folks, I create a custom plugin using extension UI that update some properties on ticket. I would like to know how do I refresh page after finish action.
Thanks in advanced.
Thanks <@U05D3US2RRB>, how about the url where the extension is running?
Unfortunately this currently isn't possible
It's something <@U01NMMDTERZ> has been thinking through though, he might have an update on it
Can I use submit/redirect/action on submit form to reload complete page?

Thanks <@U03FJQPSC0Y> for your reply, We want to create a custom create page with specific UI to provide the UX required by the customer like a flow : step 1 feel this fields, step 2 these fields, etc.

Hey, I'm not sure if this is a problem on my side, but all of a sudden (this week) I'm not able to deploy my CRM extension.
I keep getting an error stating that the serverless files can not be found, even though they are there?
This was all working before this week, without issue.
It's effecting all of my CRM extensions.

Nope the components are rendered in a sandbox, so you can't programmatically trigger a reload, you could have a button called refresh data that would link out to the current page (you would have to construct the URL with the hs_object_id yourself) and in this way it would "refresh", but you can't trigger a refresh after a serverless function finishes running
Thanks <@U03FJQPSC0Y>! I figured it wouldn't be too far behind.
<@U01QVR44MEY> Thank you!
of course
<@U05U61S9459> we are right now working to solve this. Your post is helpful input. Thanks
Thanks! record creation customization is separate than record page itself. Can you add more details on your use case? That will help too.
Hi, was anyone able to get the *`CrmAssociationTable`* working? I'm getting an _Unsupported component_ error.
can you paste your code on how you are importing it, and using it?
No errors in the CLI
You might need to re upload the whole thing
Running hs project upload
And give your screen a refresh
I did try that without any luck
Oh rough sorry
We want to do the same stuff as the Quote creation/edition process with a multiple step screen
